new NumberPickerBuilder()

0.000002 it return 2.0 (because java store it as 2.0E-6)

Prepared to be able to deploy on Sonatype OSSRH

Will need to follow the step to create account / gpg key and create  the `~/.gradle/gradle.properties` file with the following content :

```
NEXUS_USERNAME=username
NEXUS_PASSWORD=p4ssw0rd

signing.keyId=ABCDEF12
signing.password=keyPassword
signing.secretKeyRingFile=/your/home/.gnupg/secring.gpg
```

 * updated build tools version to latest (21.1.1)
